name: The Courageous Cable Online Trivia | Comics | 10 Questions

questions.text: Cable appeared as a superhero in 1990. When did he appear as a baby?
questions.explanation:
1986.

	He appeared in the 201st issue of "Uncanny X-Men", but didn't appear as a superhero until 1990. Cable was very powerful as a child, being able to repel telekinetic attacks before his second birthday!

questions.text: In "Cable and Deadpool" #4, what is the name of the large gun Cable uses?
questions.explanation:
Liefeld XS.

	This was a reference to Rob Liefeld, one of Cable's creators who left Marvel in the 1990's to found Image Comics. He has since done work for DC Comics and Marvel Comics.

questions.text: Who infected Cable with a techno-organic virus?
questions.explanation:
Apocalypse.

	The villainous Apocalypse has been one of the X-Men's deadliest adversaries since he appeared! He created Madelyne Pryor, a clone of Jean Grey, just to mate with Scott and produce Cable.

Stryfe.

	Mother Askani had Cable cloned in case he died from the techno-organic virus. Apocalypse stole the clone and raised it, naming him Stryfe.

questions.text: Pulled into the future, how long did Scott and Jean Summer raise Cable?
questions.explanation:
12 years.

	Mother Askani brought Scott and Jean into the future, where they raised Cable for twelve years, during which they finally killed Apocalypse and ended his reign.

questions.text: Cable took over the New Mutants. What did he rename them?
questions.explanation:
X-Force.

	He saw them as an asset in his battle against Stryfe and Apocalypse. He outfitted them with weapons and renamed them X-Force, to represent their harsher nature.

questions.text: What was the name of the artificial city Cable created?
questions.explanation:
Providence.

	Providence was created using the remains of the destroyed ship Greymalkin. Cable invited the world's leading scientists and thinkers to live there, hoping to do something beneficial.

questions.text: Who forcibly removed Cable's techno-organic anatomy?
questions.explanation:
Silver Surfer.

	This massively injured him, and ripped him of his telekinetic powers, causing Providence to plummet toward the Earth. Luckily, Cable was able to save it.

questions.text: In the Ultimate Universe, whom is Cable a future version of?
questions.explanation:
Wolverine.

	In this time line, Cable has three claws on his non-robotic arm, which he uses to wound Wolverine. He also kills Charles Xavier.

questions.text: Which other mercenary shot Cable in the head?
questions.explanation:
Deadpool.

	Deadpool shot Cable in a sewer, and then dragged him out. Deadpool may be crazy, but even he wouldn't leave a wounded man in the sewer!
